meanings.definition: A person who is enrolled in a program or organization.
meanings.sent1: The new enrollee joined our club yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The school has many enrollees in its music program.
meanings.sent3: The enrollee brought so much energy to our team!
meanings.sent4: She was like a bright star among the enrollees.
meanings.sent5: The enrollee's enthusiasm was contagious to everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of enrolling or registering in a program or organization.
meanings.sent1: Completing the enrollee process was quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: The enrollee for the workshop submitted the form online.
meanings.sent3: The enrollee paperwork seemed to have a mind of its own!
meanings.sent4: Registering as an enrollee felt like stepping into a new world.
meanings.sent5: The enrollee's signature marked the beginning of a new journey.
